name: animated-bars
description: A library for creating animated bar and column charts.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-src-dev
scripts.test-all: npm run test-all-dev && npm run test-all-prod
scripts.test-all-dev: npm run test-src-dev && npm run test-cjs-dev && npm run test-esm-dev && npm run test-umd-dev
scripts.test-all-prod: npm run test-src-prod && npm run test-cjs-prod && npm run test-esm-prod && npm run test-umd-prod
scripts.test-src: npm run test-src-dev && npm run test-src-prod
scripts.test-cjs: npm run test-cjs-dev && npm run test-cjs-prod
scripts.test-esm: npm run test-esm-dev && npm run test-esm-prod
scripts.test-umd: npm run test-umd-dev && npm run test-umd-prod
scripts.coveralls: npm run cover-main && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.ci: if [ $COVERAGE ]; then npm run coveralls; else npm run ci-main; fi
scripts.ci-main: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test-all

author: Oli Hawkins <oli@olihawkins.com> (http://olihawkins.com)
